content.text: The species of a bee specifies which products a bee queen produces, if the bee is only active at night and which climate the bee prefers.
The speed of a bee defines how long the queen needs to produce products.
Like the name says it its the lifespan of a bee.A long lifespan is good to produce
much resources, but a short lifespan is good for bee breeding.
How many drones the bee produces after it died.
The difference from its preferred Climate / Humidity a bee will be able to work in. This can range from zero to three, in one or both directions.
This trait defines if a naturally diurnal bee can work during the night and if a naturally nocturnal bee can work during the day.
This trait defines if the bee can fly during it rains.
This trait defines if the bee can work without a clear view of the sky.
This trait specifies which type of flower the bee needs to work.
Bees with a high flowering trait do spread flowers faster around the hive and do pollinate trees more often.
The territory in that the bee pollinates trees and flowers and the area in that the effect of the bee effects objects.
Some bees have special effects like poison other entities or speed up the growth of crops.
